\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{P_\bullet (K):} \& \cdot \&\& {P_0(K)} \& K \\
	{P_\bullet (X):} \& {P_1(X)} \&\& {P_0(X)} \& X \\
	{\mathrm{Cone}(P_\bullet (\phi))} \& {P_0(K)\oplus P_1(X)} \&\& {P_0(X)}
	\arrow["{P_\bullet (\phi) }", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[dashed, two heads, from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\phi _0}", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\phi }", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["d", from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\binom 01}", from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[dashed, two heads, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow["1", from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{(\phi_0, d)}", from=3-2, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
